displayName.thai: Pro-dev

description.arabic: أصلح 10 أخطاء دون أن تفوتك أية طلقة
description.brazilian: Conserte 10 bugs sem perder um tiro
description.bulgarian: Поправете 10 грешки, без да пропуснете нито един удар
description.czech: Opravte 10 chyb, aniž byste zmeškali jediný záběr
description.danish: Ret 10 fejl uden at gå glip af et skud
description.dutch: Los 10 bugs op zonder een schot te missen
description.english: Fix 10 bugs without missing a shot
description.finnish: Korjaa 10 virhettä ilman, että jätät yhtäkään virhettä
description.french: Corrigez 10 bugs sans rater une photo
description.german: Beheben Sie 10 Fehler, ohne einen Schuss zu verpassen
description.greek: Διορθώστε 10 σφάλματα χωρίς να χάσετε ούτε ένα πλάνο
description.hungarian: Javítson ki 10 hibát anélkül, hogy kihagyna egy lövést
description.italian: Risolvi 10 bug senza perdere un colpo
description.japanese: ショットを逃さずに 10 個のバグを修正する
description.latam: Arreglá 10 errores sin errar ningún disparo
description.norwegian: Fiks 10 feil uten å gå glipp av et skudd
description.polish: Napraw 10 błędów, nie tracąc ani jednego strzału
description.portuguese: Conserte 10 bugs sem perder um tiro
description.romanian: Remediați 10 erori fără să ratați o lovitură
description.schinese: 修复 10 个错误而不会错过任何一个镜头
description.spanish: Arreglá 10 errores sin errar ningún disparo
description.swedish: Fixa 10 buggar utan att missa ett skott
description.tchinese: 修復 10 個錯誤而不會錯過任何一個鏡頭
description.thai: แก้ไขข้อผิดพลาด 10 ข้อโดยไม่พลาดช็อตเด็ด
description.turkish: Tek bir atış bile kaçırmadan 10 hatayı düzeltin
description.vietnamese: Sửa 10 lỗi mà không bỏ lỡ một phát bắn nào

description.arabic: قم بتجميع أو تطبيق أو اختبار أي منطقة 15 مرة
description.brazilian: Compile, aplique ou teste qualquer área 15 vezes

description.dutch: Compileer, pas toe of test elk gebied 15 keer

description.german: Kompilieren, anwenden oder testen Sie einen beliebigen Bereich 15 Mal

description.polish: Skompiluj, zastosuj lub przetestuj dowolny obszar 15 razy
description.portuguese: Compile, aplique ou teste qualquer área 15 vezes
description.romanian: Compilați, aplicați sau testați orice zonă de 15 ori

description.swedish: Kompilera, applicera eller testa vilket område som helst 15 gånger
